update tb_svc_store_printer
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
BRAND_ID = #{record.brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STORE_ID = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRINTER_NO = #{record.printerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRINTER_TYPE = #{record.printerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRINTER_COMPANY_CD = #{record.printerCompanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`NAME` = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_TP = #{record.modelTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
POS_NO = #{record.posNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP_PORT = #{record.ipPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAC_ADDRESS = #{record.macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_FILE = #{record.deviceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_NM = #{record.deviceNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BITS = #{record.bits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARITY = #{record.parity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_BITS = #{record.stopBits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT_TP = #{record.portTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
BAUR_RATE = #{record.baurRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE_CNT = #{record.pageCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DISABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{record.isDisableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_ENABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{record.isEnableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT},
CONNECTION_TYPE = #{record.connectionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USB_VID = #{record.usbVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USB_PID = #{record.usbPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USB_PROTOCOL = #{record.usbProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_USED = #{record.isUsed,jdbcType=BIT},

USER_PWD = #{record.userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

UPDATED = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update tb_svc_store_printer set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, BRAND_ID = #{record.brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STORE_ID = #{record.storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRINTER_NO = #{record.printerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINTER_TYPE = #{record.printerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINTER_COMPANY_CD = #{record.printerCompanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `NAME` = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL_TP = #{record.modelTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, POS_NO = #{record.posNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_PORT = #{record.ipPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAC_ADDRESS = #{record.macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_FILE = #{record.deviceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_NM = #{record.deviceNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BITS = #{record.bits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARITY = #{record.parity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOP_BITS = #{record.stopBits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT_TP = #{record.portTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, BAUR_RATE = #{record.baurRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_CNT = #{record.pageCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DISABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{record.isDisableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_ENABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{record.isEnableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT}, CONNECTION_TYPE = #{record.connectionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USB_VID = #{record.usbVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USB_PID = #{record.usbPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USB_PROTOCOL = #{record.usbProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_USED = #{record.isUsed,jdbcType=BIT}, ACCESS_PWD = #{record.accessPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PWD = #{record.userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{record.created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED = #{record.updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update tb_svc_store_printer
BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PRINTER_NO = #{printerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRINTER_TYPE = #{printerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRINTER_COMPANY_CD = #{printerCompanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODEL_TP = #{modelTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
POS_NO = #{posNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP_PORT = #{ipPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAC_ADDRESS = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_FILE = #{deviceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_NM = #{deviceNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BITS = #{bits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARITY = #{parity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOP_BITS = #{stopBits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORT_TP = #{portTp,jdbcType=CHAR},
BAUR_RATE = #{baurRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAGE_CNT = #{pageCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_DISABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{isDisableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT},
IS_ENABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{isEnableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT},
CONNECTION_TYPE = #{connectionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USB_VID = #{usbVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USB_PID = #{usbPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USB_PROTOCOL = #{usbProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_USED = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT},
ACCESS_PWD = #{accessPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_svc_store_printer set BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRINTER_NO = #{printerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINTER_TYPE = #{printerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRINTER_COMPANY_CD = #{printerCompanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL_TP = #{modelTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, POS_NO = #{posNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_PORT = #{ipPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAC_ADDRESS = #{macAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_FILE = #{deviceFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_NM = #{deviceNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BITS = #{bits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARITY = #{parity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOP_BITS = #{stopBits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT_TP = #{portTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, BAUR_RATE = #{baurRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_CNT = #{pageCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, IS_DISABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{isDisableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT}, IS_ENABLE_BLUETOOTH = #{isEnableBluetooth,jdbcType=BIT}, CONNECTION_TYPE = #{connectionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USB_VID = #{usbVid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USB_PID = #{usbPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USB_PROTOCOL = #{usbProtocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_USED = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT}, ACCESS_PWD = #{accessPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_PWD = #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_svc_store_printer
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT IF (A.ALLOW_STORE_SET = 1, A.PG_MERCHANT_ID_STORE, A.PG_MERCHANT_ID_BRAND) AS PG_MERCHANT_ID, A.PG_PRIVATE_KEY AS PG_PRIVATE_KEY, A.PG_PAYMENT_KEY AS PG_PAYMENT_KEY, A.IP AS IP, A.IP_PORT AS IP_PORT, A.PRINTER_NO AS PRINTER_NO, A.POS_NO AS POS_NO FROM ( SELECT B.PG_MERCHANT_ID AS PG_MERCHANT_ID_BRAND, B.PG_PRIVATE_KEY AS PG_PRIVATE_KEY, B.PG_PAYMENT_KEY AS PG_PAYMENT_KEY, P.IP AS IP, P.IP_PORT AS IP_PORT, P.PRINTER_NO AS PRINTER_NO, P.POS_NO AS POS_NO, (SELECT c.ALLOW_STORE_SET FROM tb_svc_brand c WHERE c.ID = #{brandId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AS ALLOW_STORE_SET, (SELECT s.PG_MERCHANT_ID FROM tb_svc_store_set s WHERE s.BRAND_ID = #{brandId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND s.STORE_ID = #{storeId, jdbcType=BIGINT} ) AS PG_MERCHANT_ID_STORE FROM tb_svc_brand_set B LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_svc_store_printer P ON P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.STORE_ID = #{storeId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND P.IS_USED = 1 WHERE B.BRAND_ID = #{brandId, jdbcType=BIGINT}) A
